title: User login error
description: The user cannot log in with valid credentials.

title: Blank dashboard screen
description: A blank screen appears when accessing the main dashboard.

title: Update contact details
description: The client requests an update of email and phone number.

title: 500 error when creating order
description: An internal server error occurs when creating an order.

title: Update legal text
description: Modify the legal notice text according to new regulations.

title: Slow page loading
description: Several pages take too long to load.

title: Broken image links
description: Some images are not displayed correctly on the website.

title: Password reset email not sent
description: Users do not receive the password reset email.

title: Add new user role
description: Request to add a new role to the user management system.

title: Export data to CSV
description: Enable data export functionality in CSV format.

title: Server is down
description: the server from production is failing, error 500
